definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: mix, or compound oil, ointment (perh. denom.; in this case √ meaning unknown; NH has [[מִרְקַחַת]] ointment; Ph. [[רקח]] either spice-mixer (Bloch) or spice-dealer (Lzb); perh. akin to As. riḳḳu, spice, Meissn:Suppl. 90, cf. rikkê, Dl:HWB 620);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִרְקַח]] Ex 30:33; Pt. [[רׂקֵחַ]] v:Ex 30:25, v:Ex 30:35, ´[[רוֹ]]: Ex 37:29, Ec 10:1; pl. cstr. [[רׂקְחֵי]] 1Ch 9:39;—mix, compound, Ex 30:33 (P; [[כָּמׂהוּ]], i.e. anything like the holy oil); pt. as subst. [[הַמִּרְקַחַת רׂקְחֵי]] 1Ch 9:30 compounders of the ointment; as a professional name, mixer, perfumer, Ex 30:25, Ex 30:35, Ex 37:29, Ec 10:1.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf. abs. [[הַרְקַח]] [[הַמֶּרְקָחָה]] Ez Eze 24:10 (‖[[הָתֵם ]]), as Imv., spice the spicing (?), i.e. spice (the meat) well, but very dub., Krae prop. [[חָרֵק הַמָּרָק]] empty out the broth.
